entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
